SET SCHEMA PUBLIC.BOOKS;

CREATE TABLE AUTHORS
(
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  FIRSTNAME VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  LASTNAME VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  ADDRESS1 VARCHAR,
  ADDRESS2 VARCHAR,
  CITY VARCHAR,
  STATE VARCHAR,
  POSTALCODE VARCHAR,
  COUNTRY VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE BOOKAUTHORS
(
  BOOKID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  AUTHORID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "UPDATE" CLOB
);

CREATE TABLE BOOKS
(
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  TITLE VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  DESCRIPTION VARCHAR,
  PUBLISHERID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PUBLICATIONDATE DATE,
  PRICE DOUBLE,
  PREVIOUSEDITIONID INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE "Global Counts"
(
  "Global Count" INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE PUBLISHERS
(
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  PUBLISHER VARCHAR
);

SET SCHEMA PUBLIC.FOR_LINT;

CREATE TABLE EXTRA_PK
(
  WRITERID BIGINT NOT NULL,
  PUBLICATIONID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Global Counts"
(
  "Global Count" INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE PUBLICATIONS
(
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  TITLE VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  DESCRIPTION VARCHAR,
  WRITERID BIGINT NOT NULL,
  PUBLICATIONDATE DATE,
  PRICE DOUBLE,
  "UPDATE" CLOB,
  PRESS_RELEASE CLOB
);

CREATE TABLE PUBLICATIONWRITERS
(
  PUBLICATIONID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  WRITERID BIGINT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SELFREFERENCE
(
  ID INTEGER NOT NULL,
  TITLE VARCHAR NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE WRITERS
(
  ID BIGINT NOT NULL,
  FIRSTNAME VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  LASTNAME VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  ADDRESS1 VARCHAR,
  ADDRESS2 VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  CITY VARCHAR,
  STATE VARCHAR,
  POSTALCODE VARCHAR,
  COUNTRY VARCHAR,
  PHONE1 VARCHAR,
  PHONE2 VARCHAR,
  EMAIL1 VARCHAR,
  EMAIL2 INTEGER,
  FAX VARCHAR,
  FAX3 INTEGER,
  HOMEEMAIL11 VARCHAR,
  HOMEEMAIL12 VARCHAR,
  PUBLICATION_ID BIGINT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ΠΊΝΑΚΑΒΆΣΗΣΔΕΔΟΜΈΝΩΝ
(
  ΣΤΉΛΗΒΆΣΗΣΔΕΔΟΜΈΝΩΝ BIGINT NOT NULL,
  ΆΛΛΗΣΤΉΛΗΒΆΣΗΣΔΕΔΟΜΈΝΩΝ VARCHAR,
  ΣΥΓΓΡΑΦΈΑΣ INTEGER
);

SET SCHEMA PUBLIC.INFORMATION_SCHEMA;

SET SCHEMA PUBLIC.PUBLIC;

SET SCHEMA PUBLIC."PUBLISHER SALES";

CREATE TABLE REGIONS
(
  CITY VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  STATE VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  POSTALCODE VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  COUNTRY VARCHAR NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SALES
(
  POSTALCODE VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  COUNTRY VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  BOOKID INTEGER,
  PERIODENDDATE DATE,
  TOTALAMOUNT DOUBLE,
  SALESDATAID INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE SALESDATA
(
  SALESDATAID INTEGER,
  YEARLYAMOUNT DOUBLE
);

SET SCHEMA PUBLIC.SYSTEM_LOBS;
